title: Create New Server with Valid Configuration
description: Verify that a user can create a new game server by specifying server name, type, and custom settings successfully.

steps.description: Open the Server Management section from the sidebar.
Click 'Create New Server' button.
Input valid server name, select server type, and configure server settings.
Submit server creation form.
New server is created and listed in server list.
Server details and custom configurations are correctly displayed.

title: Start and Stop Server
description: Verify a user can start and stop a created server and view updated status accordingly.

steps.description: Select an existing server from server list.
Click 'Start Server' button.
Server status is updated to 'Running' and server information is shown.
Click 'Stop Server' button.
Server status changes to 'Stopped'.

title: Manage Multiple Servers Simultaneously
description: Verify user can create, start, stop, and view status of multiple game servers without conflicts.

steps.description: Create multiple servers with unique names and types.
Start all servers sequentially.
All servers show 'Running' status.
Stop servers in any order.
Server statuses update correctly to 'Stopped'.

title: Install Mod from File
description: Verify the user can upload and install a mod file successfully and view it in installed mods.

steps.description: Navigate to Mod Management section.
Click 'Install Mod' and upload a valid mod file.
Mod installation completes successfully without errors.
Installed mod appears in the list of installed mods.

title: Install Modpack
description: Verify that user can install a modpack and its mods appear correctly in the mod list.

steps.description: Open Mod Management.
Select and install a valid modpack file.
Modpack installation completes successfully.
All mods included in the modpack appear correctly under installed mods.

title: Manage Mod Configurations
description: Verify that user can update mod configurations and changes persist.

steps.description: Select an installed mod.
Change mod configuration settings.
Save configuration changes.
Configurations update successfully and persist after application restart.

title: Create Server Backup
description: Verify user can create a backup of a selected server and it appears in backup history.

steps.description: Navigate to Backup System section.
Select a server and click 'Create Backup'.
Backup is created without errors.
New backup appears in backup history list.

title: Restore Server from Backup
description: Verify user can restore a server to a previous state from a backup successfully.

steps.description: Access backup history for a server.
Select a backup and click 'Restore'.
Server state is restored to the backup point.

title: Manage Backup Storage
description: Verify user can view, organize, and delete backups from storage properly.

steps.description: Navigate to backup storage management.
Delete an existing backup.
Backup is removed from the history and storage.
Verify available storage space reflects deletion.

title: Plugin Installation and Status
description: Verify users can install plugins, view status, and see dependencies correctly.

steps.description: Open Plugin Setup.
Install a valid plugin.
Plugin installs without failure.
Plugin status shows as active or installed.
Check plugin dependency list.
All dependencies are listed and correctly managed.

title: Configure Plugin Settings
description: Verify the user can update plugin configurations and changes apply successfully.

steps.description: Select an installed plugin.
Modify its configuration parameters.
Save the configuration.
Plugin settings update and persist correctly.

title: View and Configure Server Eggs
description: Verify user can view default eggs, create custom eggs, and configure egg variables.

steps.description: Navigate to Egg Management.
Available eggs are listed correctly.
Create a new custom egg with valid parameters.
Custom egg is added and appears in the egg list.
Modify configuration variables for an egg.
Changes to egg variables save and take effect.

title: Edit Server Configuration Files
description: Verify user can browse, edit, save configuration files, and view file history.

steps.description: Open File Editor.
Browse to a configuration file for a server.
Edit content of the configuration file.
Save changes.
File changes save successfully and are reflected on disk.
View file change history.
File history displays past versions correctly.

title: Use Global Command Palette
description: Verify that users can open command palette, search commands, and execute commands quickly.

steps.description: Press keyboard shortcut to open the global command palette.
Command palette opens promptly.
Input search keywords to filter commands.
Relevant commands appear matching the search.
Select and execute a command from the list.
Selected command executes correctly and triggers associated feature.

title: Application Startup Performance
description: Verify the application launches within 3 seconds under normal conditions.

steps.description: Launch ServerMint application.
Application main window is fully loaded and interactive within 3 seconds.

title: UI Interaction Responsiveness
description: Verify UI interactions respond within 500 milliseconds such as navigation and button clicks.

steps.description: Navigate to different sidebar sections.
Each navigation and UI interaction completes with response time under 500ms.

title: Server Operation Atomicity
description: Verify that server start/stop and backup operations complete atomically without partial failure states.

steps.description: Start a server.
Server starts completely or rolls back to stopped state on failure.
Create a backup simultaneously.
Backup completes fully or fails cleanly without corrupt partial backups.

title: Automatic Data Save
description: Verify that changes to configurations, plugins, and mods are saved automatically without explicit user action.

steps.description: Modify server or plugin configuration.
Data saves automatically in the background.
Restart the application.
Changes persist after restart without loss.

title: Error Handling on Invalid Mod File Upload
description: Verify that uploading an invalid or corrupted mod file shows a proper error message without crashing the app.

steps.description: Navigate to Mod Management.
Attempt to upload an invalid or unsupported mod file.
Application displays a user-friendly error message.
Application remains stable and responsive.

title: Invalid Server Configuration Handling
description: Verify appropriate validation and error messages when creating a server with invalid or missing required inputs.

steps.description: Attempt to create a server without specifying name or type.
Validation errors are displayed preventing server creation.

title: Dark Theme and Green Accent Consistency
description: Verify the UI is consistent with dark theme styling and green accent colors across all major screens.

steps.description: Navigate through all major application sections.
UI uses consistent dark backgrounds with green accent highlights according to design requirements.

title: Sidebar Navigation Accessibility
description: Verify that all features are accessible via the left sidebar navigation and that it behaves responsively on different screen sizes.

steps.description: Check that each feature link exists in sidebar.
Resize application window to various common screen sizes.
Sidebar remains accessible and usable across screen sizes.

title: Graceful Handling of Backend Communication Failures
description: Verify application handles failed backend calls gracefully without crashing, showing proper error feedback.

steps.description: Simulate backend failure or communication error.
Perform an operation requiring backend response (e.g., start server).
User sees a clear error message, and the UI remains responsive.
